net.sf.mmm.search.base.config

Class SearchFieldConfigurationBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.search.base.config.SearchFieldConfigurationBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchFieldConfiguration

    public class SearchFieldConfigurationBean
extends Object
implements SearchFieldConfiguration
    This is the implementation of SearchFieldConfiguration as JAXB-ready Java-Bean.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • SearchFieldConfigurationBean

        public SearchFieldConfigurationBean(String name)
        The constructor.
        Creates a default field with SearchFieldType.TEXT and SearchFieldMode.SEARCHABLE_AND_RETRIEVABLE.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name.

      • isHidden

        public boolean isHidden()
        This method determines if the represented field shall be hidden in the view. This means it is NOT displayed in the details of a SearchHit. The default is false.
        Specified by:
        isHidden in interface SearchFieldConfiguration
        Returns:
        true if hidden, false otherwise.

      • setHidden

        public void setHidden(boolean hidden)
        Parameters:
        hidden - is the hidden to set
